season: Season 1 - Siege of the Azure Vale

enemies.name: Castle Grunt
enemies.description: Steady foot soldiers that set the tempo for the siege. Low health but stubborn once they clump.
tips: Use Arrow towers for clean last-hits and combo building.
Maintain buffer discipline; over-typing on grunts wastes time before elites spawn.

enemies.name: Vale Runner
enemies.description: Fast scouts that pressure weak lanes and punish slow buffers.
tips: Keep a fast-firing turret in their lane or hold combo for burst typing.
Clear runners early to preserve combo before elites arrive.

enemies.name: Hex Witch
enemies.description: Cackling casters that weave shielding hexes over nearby units, slowing your clear speed.
tips: Prioritize with Arcane Focus to strip shields quickly.
Break shields with turret fire, then finish with typing to save combo time.

enemies.name: Siege Brute
enemies.description: Juggernauts that soak turret fire while pushing for breaches. Often arrive with shield plates.
tips: Stack turret fire first to crack shields, then type to finish.
Keep castle repairs ready if multiple brutes slip through.

enemies.name: Vanguard Lancer
enemies.description: Elite lancers that punish under-defended lanes. Their presence signals a wave spike.
tips: Mix damage types (turret + typing) to shred armor faster.
Assign highest-DPS slot or focus fire with multiple turrets.

enemies.name: Embermancer
enemies.description: Pyromancers that arrive late and test sustain; they pair with shield casters to stall you out.
tips: Burn ticks reward fast clears; keep combos healthy to end fights before the burn stacks.
Save gold for rapid upgrades when Embermancers are queued.

enemies.name: Archivist Lyra
enemies.description: The siege mastermind. Mixes shield surges with burst damage checks and taunts that distract defenders.
tips: Maintain turret uptime to pop shields; typing alone won’t cut it.
Keep combo alive through phase shifts—losing it mid-boss costs precious DPS.
